A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the plot isn't the best\, it is still easier to follow than most of the other Star Wars movies. It doesn't get bogged down in complex politics\, and instead teaches us how to love the new characters more. It is an excellent transition from the old generation to the new one\, and it shows all of the new characters learning from their mistakes and making new friendships. It has one of the best scenes in all of the franchise - you'll know it when you see it - and the ending parallels an old moment in a beautiful way. It really connects to the heart of Star Wars\, about the power of hope and love.
